committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research
Subcommittee on Telecommunications and the Internet

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to make loans for the development of broadband services in rural areas.

summary.text: Rural America Broadband Deployment Act - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to make loans to eligible persons and entities to provide or improve broadband (high-speed Internet access) service in rural areas. Allows the Secretary to refinance existing loans when the refinancing is used for such purposes.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to make loans for the development of broadband services in rural areas.
